Name: Piazza del Duomo
Notes: Historic heart; evening passeggiata; watch for petty theft.

Name: Piazza Università
Notes: Studenty vibe; street performers on weekends.

Name: Piazza Stesicoro & Via Etnea stretch
Notes: Pedestrian boulevard; cafés/bars; busiest during events.

Name: Via Santa Filomena
Notes: Cluster of trendy bistros and tapas-style spots; narrow street.

Name: Via Gemmellaro bar strip
Notes: Compact bar street near Stesicoro; late on weekends.

Name: Piazza Teatro Massimo (Bellini area)
Notes: Opera house square with cocktail bars; elegant crowd.

Name: Via Plebiscito street‑food corridor
Notes: Grills/rosticcerie; lively, more food‑forward than clubby.

Name: San Berillo lanes
Notes: Regenerated pockets with bars/art spaces; stay on main‑lit lanes.

Name: Lungomare di Catania (Viale Ruggero di Lauria)
Address: Viale Ruggero di Lauria, Catania, Italy
Notes: Seafront stroll, kiosks, gelato; sunset crowds.

Name: Ognina–Scogliera viewpoints
Notes: Rocky lava coast lookouts; popular on warm nights.

Name: Aci Trezza – Lungomare dei Ciclopi
Address: Lungomare dei Ciclopi, Aci Trezza, Italy
Notes: Harbor & islets views; aperitivo bars fill at sunset.

Name: Mercati Generali
Notes: Iconic warehouse-style venue; check schedule & transport.

Name: MA Catania (MA Music Action)
Notes: Multi-room venue for live shows & late DJs; central.

Name: Qubba
Address: Contrada Cubba Marletta, Misterbianco CT, Italy
Notes: Large events space just outside Catania; late nights.

Name: Morgana Lounge Bar
Notes: Chic cocktail club with courtyard; reservations recommended.
